verdict.bottomLine: Fliki is best for creators who need fast blog-to-video repurposing and voiceover-first workflows. The main trade-off is visual accuracy: auto-selected stock footage often misses context and requires manual replacement. Free plan exports are watermarked at 720p; commercial rights and 1080p exports require a paid plan.

faqs.question: Can I use Fliki for free?
faqs.answer: Yes, Fliki offers a Free plan to try the product. Free plan exports include a visible watermark.

faqs.question: Does the Free plan include a watermark?
faqs.answer: Yes—videos generated on the Free plan contain a Fliki watermark. If you need clean exports, you'll likely need a paid plan.

faqs.question: What export resolution do I get on Free vs paid plans?
faqs.answer: Free users export HD 720p videos. Paid plans support Full HD 1080p exports.

faqs.question: How do minutes/credits work?
faqs.answer: Credits are deducted based on the total length of the video. Free includes 5 minutes monthly, while paid plans provide more minutes.

faqs.question: Do paid plans include commercial rights?
faqs.answer: Yes—commercial rights are listed on paid subscription plans. Free plan commercial rights are not granted.

faqs.question: What formats can I export?
faqs.answer: Fliki supports exporting in MP4, MOV, MP3, and WAV formats. This lets you export video or audio-only versions.

faqs.question: Can I download subtitles separately?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can download subtitles in both SRT and VTT formats. This is useful for publishing captions outside the editor.

faqs.question: What browser should I use?
faqs.answer: It's a web-based app and Chrome is the recommended browser. Other browsers may work, but performance can vary.

faqs.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
faqs.answer: You can cancel anytime by going to Account and selecting Manage billing. This is handled from your billing dashboard.

faqs.question: What's the refund policy?
faqs.answer: Refund requests may be considered case-by-case and granted at the company's sole discretion. Don't assume refunds are guaranteed if you forget to cancel.

faqs.question: Will the AI automatically pick relevant stock footage?
faqs.answer: User reports: auto-selected stock visuals can miss the script's intended context. Plan time to replace clips manually for best results.

faqs.question: What are the minimum hardware/RAM requirements?
faqs.answer: No specific hardware/RAM thresholds are confirmed. If you see lag, try Chrome and a faster connection first.
